senses.sense_definition: A warm dry wind blowing down the north sides of the Alps, especially in Switzerland.

examples.text: The warm <w>foehn</w> melted the snow in the valley very quickly.
Many residents claim that the Alpine <w>foehn</w> gives them severe headaches.

senses.sense_definition: A warm, dry wind that flows down the sheltered side of a mountain range.

examples.text: The <w>foehn</w> effect explains why this side of the island is so dry.
Farmers worry that the hot <w>foehn</w> will damage their crops before the harvest.
